EmailTemplate.subject: Wouldn’t You Like To See The Auction Cars You’re Missing?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:

Our research shows these dealers face a two-tiered problem. They aren’t aware of all the available cars, and they don’t have time to efficiently evaluate them to make profit-smart bids.
Dealers are tackling this challenge with innovative technology and tools. In an instant, they can efficiently evaluate 10x more of the cars they need at leading wholesale auctions, and work the lanes faster and smarter than they’ve ever done in the past.
AuctionGenius has been a game-changer for these dealers, and it will be for the dozens who signed up for the tool at NADA in San Francisco.
